Package mb.tictactoe

Class Summary
ClientFrame Client uses this to play the game and chat.
GameParticipants Simple pane used to do some per-participant operations, or just for displaying the list of them.
ServerCreationFrame Allows creation of TicTacToe server.
ServerFrame Used to manage a running server.
ServerJoiningFrame  
TicTacToe Main class that initializes two instances: client and server.
TicTacToeConstants Class holding some constants, mainly file paths.
Ttt Class containing utility methods that correspond to game rules of Tic Tac Toe.
TttAdminDataPane Contains data used to initialise server properly (basic properties of the board).
TttBoard Contains game board.
TttChat Chat, that has basic functionality of sending messages and viewing received messages list.
TttClientDataPane Pane with places for login and password as well as other settings that user enters before connection.
TttFrame Superclass of 4 main frame classes.
TttLog Log designed for the TicTacToe server.
TttRunClient Class used to start only the client instance.
TttRunServer Class used to start only server instance.
TttServerDataPane Pane containing hostname, port and timeout for user/admin to enter when connecting to/creating server.
